pr_title: Snapshot of APIs as of Apache NetBeans 12.1

timeline.message: Snapshot of APIs as of Apache NetBeans 12.1 cade25887c5450e4595fa59e616daee4d2520ee0

timeline.bodyText: It would be better to remove all these getPeer() methods from the listing. They are not present on newer JDK and if we include them in the .sig file, then the ant build (which includes sigtest check) will fail on JDK11+.
timeline.author: JaroslavTulach
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -159,6 +159,8 @@ meth public java.awt.im.InputMethodRequests getInputMethodRequests()
 meth public java.awt.image.ColorModel getColorModel()
 meth public java.awt.image.VolatileImage createVolatileImage(int,int)
 meth public java.awt.image.VolatileImage createVolatileImage(int,int,java.awt.ImageCapabilities) throws java.awt.AWTException
+meth public java.awt.peer.ComponentPeer getPeer()

replies.bodyText:
OK, done - please double check @JaroslavTulach
Used -
find . -name "*.sig" -exec sed -i '/java.awt.peer.ComponentPeer/{N;d;}' {} \;

If that looks correct we should document that unless/until generation is fixed.  Initially matched on getPeer() until I realised there's a non-AWT method with same name.
replies.author: neilcsmith-net

replies.bodyText:
Great:
curl https://patch-diff.githubusercontent.com/raw/apache/netbeans/pull/2338.diff | grep getPeer

yields nothing. Good job.
replies.author: JaroslavTulach

timeline.bodyText: @jlahoda, really!? ProjectConfiguration inner class as your public API?
timeline.author: JaroslavTulach
timeline.diffHunk:

+meth public final void wait(long,int) throws java.lang.InterruptedException
+meth public int hashCode()
+meth public java.lang.String toString()
+
+CLSS public abstract interface org.netbeans.modules.cpplite.editor.spi.CProjectConfigurationProvider
+innr public static ProjectConfiguration

+meth public abstract void addChangeListener(javax.swing.event.ChangeListener)
+meth public abstract void removeChangeListener(javax.swing.event.ChangeListener)

+CLSS public static org.netbeans.modules.cpplite.editor.spi.CProjectConfigurationProvider$ProjectConfiguration

timeline.bodyText: Just a result of moving to another cluster, I assume. CCing @lkishalmi
timeline.author: JaroslavTulach

timeline.bodyText: @timboudreau's lookup improvements made it into NetBeans 12.1!

timeline.message: Manually remove getPeer() from sig files.
